oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Magnetic Impurity Inspired Abelian Higgs Vortices
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Han, Xiaosen
Yang, Yisong
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: High Energy Physics - Theory
Mathematical Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Inspired by magnetic impurity considerations some broad classes of Abelian Higgs and Chern--Simons--Higgs BPS vortex equations are derived and analyzed.
